text:
Here, we've highlighted photographic, sound, and moving image materials at the JFK Library—starting with the most popular—that support research on John F. Kennedy's November 1963 trip to Texas, his death and memorial services, and their impact. Note: not all materials are listed online; for more information please contact JFK.AVarchives@nara.gov.

Please note that the central repository for JFK Assassination-related materials is the National Archives at College Park, as mandated by the John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act of 1992.
